SAINT.Name: Hieromartyr Mark the Bishop of Arethusa, Martyr Cyril the Deacon of Heliopolis, and others who suffered under Julian the Apostate (+ c.363)

St. Eustathius (Eustace) the Confessor the Bishop of Bithynia (9th C)

New Hieromartyr Paul Voinarsky and with him Paul and Alexis (+1919)
